item.description:
The Bruins will play in St Louis at the end of a 3-game Western Conference road trip, for their only meeting a this season.


Although this is an East vs. West matchup, we're in luck this year, as both teams are fighting for the top seed in their respective conferences.


Since we all can't fly to St Louis, join the Collective's resident Blues (& hockey) fans at Ladder 133 in Providence to watch the game!


Raghav will be hosting this meetup, and providing free "How to be a Hockey Fan" lessons to all who ask.  :)


Series Trivia: The road team has won the last 5 games, with the Blues winning in Boston last year.


Game Time: 8:00PM
item.name: Boston Bruins @ St.Louis Blues - watch party at Ladder 133
